= Setting up =
  * install packages:
    {{{cat egw.list | xargs yum install}}}
  * start services:
    {{{service mysql start; service httpd start}}}
  * create DB and user:
    {{{
mysql
CREATE DATABASE egroupware;
GRANT ALL ON egroupware.* TO 'egroupware'@'localhost' IDENTIFIED BY 'egwpassword';
}}}

      Save.

== Contacts ==
Prefs - AB:
  * LDAP
  * ou=Contacts
gq: create ou
/etc/openldap/slapd.conf:
  * access to dn="ou=Contacts,dc=com,dc=ru" by * write

= Note =
eGW make all accounts as "uid=<uid>,..." in ldap tree - not cn=...

* php-mysql
* php-mbstring
* php-ldap
* php-imap
* php-xml
* php-gd
* php-pear-Auth-SASL (PEAR::Auth_SASL)
